basics.name: Iker Gonzalez
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Richard hails from Tulsa. He has earned degrees from the University of Oklahoma and Stanford. (Go Sooners and Cardinals!) Before starting Pied Piper, he worked for Hooli as a part time software developer. While his work focuses on applied information theory, mostly optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory. He could tell you about it, but THAT would NOT be a “length-limited” conversation!

work.name: Aiag Asesores
work.summary: Aiag Asesores is a tech-centric small business consulting firm focused on providing tailored legal, tax, labor and bookeping services.
highlights: Build the digital presence of the company from scratch
Orquestrated back-end automations using Zapier and Google Apps Script (Javascript)
Website development and SEO (positioned first on Googlein various long tail keywords)
Developed the companies ERP with Apsheet's technology

work.name: Environment Agency
highlights: Constraints check using Easimap2 Permitting software
Meetings between developers, Local Planning Authorities (LPA) and Environment Agency's consultees
Team working along with Biodiversity, Fisheries, Flood Risk, Strategic Planning and Groundwater Contamination teams

education.summary: No teachers, peer to peer learning, open 24/7, gamified project-based methodology, international network. One of the most innovative coding schools in the world.
Academic direction from The London School of Economics

volunteer.summary: CEC is the international network of the circular economy field which builds strong local clubs who design, implement and support circular local initiatives.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard. That is all.
